All chords are based on the live version https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yVBVozI_gx0
Notice that this version has slight changes on lyrics when compared to the studio (spotify) version.
While the studio version is more complete in terms of musicality, this version provides a "rawer feels".
For this reason, I adapted the lyrics of the live version instead of the studio version. Okay, w/o further ado

content.text:
This is Ian Axel's new project A Great Big World's version of his song "Say Something".
 http://agreatbigworld.com/
The version appeared on "So You Think You Can Dance" on 9/3/2013.
It's SUUUPER simple in drop d and sounds lovely with a piano backing.

Tuning: Drop D

Chords (DADGBE): B (999---) G (555---) D(000---) A(777---) F#(444---)

[Intro] х2
[ch]Bm[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] 

[Chorus]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch] 
  Say something, I'm giving up on you.
[ch]Bm[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch] 
  I'll be the one, if you want me to.
[ch]Bm[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]         [ch]A[/ch]
  Anywhere, I would've followed you.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch] 
  Say something, I'm giving up on you.

[Verse]  
    [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]F#m[/ch]            
And I am feeling so small.
        [ch]G[/ch]
It was over my head
                  [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]A[/ch]
I know nothing at all.
    [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]F#m[/ch]  
And I will stumble and fall.
            [ch]G[/ch]
I'm still learning to love
                 [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]A[/ch]
Just starting to crawl.

[Chorus]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]A[/ch] 
   Say something, I'm giving up on you.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]A[/ch] 
   I'm sorry that I couldn't get to you.
[ch]Bm[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]A[/ch]
   Anywhere, I will follow you.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch] 
   Say something, I'm giving up on you.

[Verse]
    [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]F#m[/ch]  
And I will swallow my pride.
            [ch]G[/ch]
You're the one that I love
                   [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch]
And I'm saying goodbye.

[Chorus]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch] 
  Say something, I'm giving up on you.
[ch]Bm[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch] 
  I'll be the one, if you want me to.

  Say something, I'm giving up on you.

  Say something, I'm giving up on you.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch] 
Say something...

content.text:
I feel chord inversions really make or break this song. So here's how I play it.

Tempo around 47 bpm

[Intro]

RH - D drones quarter notes throughout
LH - Bm5 - G5 - D5 - A5 (+ add4 with C# in RH) 


[Verse]

All bass notes (LH) are in root position, but some chords (RH) are inverted.

D (root)
F#m (2nd inversion: C# - F# - A)
G (2nd inversion: B - D - G) +optional add9 in 3rd measure
D (root)
A (1st inversion: C# - E - A)


[Chorus]

Similar to the intro, but full chords.

Bm (root)
G (2nd inversion: B - D - G)
D (root)
A (1st inversion: C# - E - A)

content.text:
Hey guys! This is my first contribution to Ultimate Guitar! Hope you all enjoy :)
This is a great song by Sam Smith, and upcoming artist from the U.K.

LADIES: If you don't want to say "'cause I'm just a man" in the first verse, I have tried "'cause I'm just
 human" and it works if you figure out the correct way to pronounce it :)

***In most cases throughout the verse, the C note is held for a whole note (four beats).***


[Intro]

[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] (x2)


[Verse 1]

[ch]Am[/ch]                       [ch]F[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]
Guess it's true, I'm not good at a one-night stand
[ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]F[/ch]                      [ch]C[/ch]
But I still need love 'cause I'm just a man ("human")
[ch]Am[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]
These nights never seem to go to plan
[ch]Am[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]C[/ch]       ..([ch]G[/ch]) 
I don't want you to leave, will you hold my hand?


[Chorus]

[ch]G[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch] 
Oh, won't you stay with me?
([ch]G[/ch])           [ch]Am[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]
'Cause you're all I need
([ch]G[/ch])           [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
This ain't love, it's clear to see
([ch]G[/ch])          [ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
But darling, stay with me


[Verse 2]

[ch]Am[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]
     Why am I so emotional?
[ch]Am[/ch]                  [ch]F[/ch]                      [ch]C[/ch]
No, it's not a good look, gain some self-control
